title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers: Leigh Brackett, Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas
actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
movieDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors: Keanu Reaves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
movieDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
movieDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
movieDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
movieDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
writers: Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas, Philip Kaufman
actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
movieDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers: Hampton Fancher, David Webb Peoples, Philip K. Dick
actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
movieDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers: James Cameron, Gale Anne Hurd, William Wisher
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biegn
movieDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Equalizer
actors: Denzel Washington, Haley Bennett
movieDescription: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

title: Resident Evil
actors: Milla Jovovich, Ryan McCluskey
movieDescription: A special military unit fights a powerful out of control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

title: Once Upon a Time in China
writers: Hark Tsui, Kai-Chi Yuen, Yiu Ming Leung
actors: Jet Li, Biao Yuen, Jacky Cheung
movieDescription: Legendary martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung fights against foreign forces plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.

title: Baby Boy
actors: Tyrese Gibson, Taraji P. Henson
movieDescription: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a baby boy, faces the commitments of real life.

title: Fantastic Four
writers: Mark Frost, Michael France, Stan Lee
actors: Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis, Jessica Alba
movieDescription: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

title: Black Panther
writers: Stan Lee, Joe Robert Cole, Ryan Coogler
actors: Chadswick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan
movieDescription: TChalla, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his countrys past.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown
movieDescription: The story follows the life of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is wrongfully convicted of murder and sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary. Inside the prison, he forms a deep friendship with fellow inmate Red.

title: The Godfather
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard Castellano, Robert Duvall
movieDescription: The movie explores the themes of power, family, loyalty, and the morally ambiguous choices individuals must make in the pursuit of their ambitions.

title: Inception
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Ken Watanabe, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Marion Cotillard, Elliot Page
movieDescription: A professional thief who steals information by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets. He is offered a chance to have his criminal history erased, as payment for the implantation of another person idea into a target subconscious.

title: Forrest Gump
actors: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise, Mykelti Williamson, Sally Field
movieDescription: The film follows several decades in the life of a slow-witted and kindhearted Alabama man named Forrest Gump (Hanks) and his experiences in the 20th-century United States.

title: The Dark Knight
actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Heath Ledger, Gary Oldman, Aaron Eckhart
movieDescription: Set in the dark and gritty Gotham City, the movie explores complex themes of chaos, morality, and the thin line between heroism and villainy.

title: The Princess Bride
actors: Cary Elwes,Mandy Patinkin,Robin Wright
movieDescription: A bedridden boy whose grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.
